Monologue.Current: Selphie{Line}“{Char Squall}, it’s our first SeeD mission!”{Next}“Looks like we’re going to {Color Blue}〖{Term Timber}〗{Color White}.{Line} Meet {Color Blue}〖by the front gate〗{Color White}.”{Next}“Hurry!”
Monologue.Original: Selphie{Line}“{Char Squall}, it’s our first SeeD mission!”{Next}“Looks like we’re going to {Color Blue}〖{Term Timber}〗{Color White}.{Line} Meet {Color Blue}〖by the front gate〗{Color White}.”{Next}“Hurry!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Я просто пойду спать...”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“I’ll just go to sleep...”

Monologue.Current: (...I’m bored...)
Monologue.Original: (...I’m bored...)

Monologue.Current: (What’s everybody doing?)
Monologue.Original: (What’s everybody doing?)

Monologue.Current: 〖Save Point〗{Line} Access the Menu and select{Line}[Save] to save your game.
Monologue.Original: 〖Save Point〗{Line} Access the Menu and select{Line}[Save] to save your game.

Monologue.Current: Received [Weapons Monthly, April Issue]!
Monologue.Original: Received [Weapons Monthly, April Issue]!

Monologue.Current: “You defeated the 4-Suits.”
Monologue.Original: “You defeated the 4-Suits.”

Monologue.Current: “You’ve proven yourself worthy.”
Monologue.Original: “You’ve proven yourself worthy.”

Monologue.Current: Quistis{Line}“The CC group leader,{Line} the card master King...”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“The CC group leader,{Line} the card master King...”

Monologue.Current: Quistis{Line}“...Is I, Quistis Trepe.{Line} All decked out in my uniform!”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“...Is I, Quistis Trepe.{Line} All decked out in my uniform!”

Monologue.Current: Quistis{Line}“{Char Squall}, you really are something.{Line} I can’t believe how much your{Line} game has improved.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“{Char Squall}, you really are something.{Line} I can’t believe how much your{Line} game has improved.”

Monologue.Current: Quistis{Line}“I knew we were destined to play.{Line} Let’s begin!”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“I knew we were destined to play.{Line} Let’s begin!”

Monologue.Current: Quistis{Line}“I can’t believe I lost.”{Next}“Don’t get too cocky{Line} just yet.”{Next}“We can challenge each other{Line} as equals from now on.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“I can’t believe I lost.”{Next}“Don’t get too cocky{Line} just yet.”{Next}“We can challenge each other{Line} as equals from now on.”

Monologue.Current: Quistis{Line}“Hey, you’re pretty good.{Line} Just as I expected.”{Next}“Looks like we’ll be playing{Line} many more games to come.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Hey, you’re pretty good.{Line} Just as I expected.”{Next}“Looks like we’ll be playing{Line} many more games to come.”

Monologue.Current: Quistis{Line}“You still have a long way to go.{Line} I thought you’d be a{Line} better player by now.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“You still have a long way to go.{Line} I thought you’d be a{Line} better player by now.”

Monologue.Current: Quistis{Line}“Oh, my... You can’t back out now!{Line} We were destined to play.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Oh, my... You can’t back out now!{Line} We were destined to play.”

Monologue.Current: Quistis{Line}“I’m always up for a game,{Line} but only in the Garden cockpit.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“I’m always up for a game,{Line} but only in the Garden cockpit.”

Monologue.Current: Quistis{Line}“See you later, {Char Squall}.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“See you later, {Char Squall}.”

Monologue.Current: Quistis{Line}“What do you mean{Line} you don’t have enough cards?{Line} Oh well, that’s too bad.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“What do you mean{Line} you don’t have enough cards?{Line} Oh well, that’s too bad.”

Monologue.Current: Quistis{Line}“{Char Squall}, you know{Line} {Term Balamb}’s rules, right?{Line} Why don’t we use that, too?”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“{Char Squall}, you know{Line} {Term Balamb}’s rules, right?{Line} Why don’t we use that, too?”

Monologue.Current: Quistis{Line}“{Char Squall}, you know{Line} {Term Galbadia}’s rules, right?{Line} Why don’t we use that, too?”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“{Char Squall}, you know{Line} {Term Galbadia}’s rules, right?{Line} Why don’t we use that, too?”

Monologue.Current: Quistis{Line}“{Char Squall}, you know{Line} {Term Trabia}’s rules, right?{Line} Why don’t we use that, too?”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“{Char Squall}, you know{Line} {Term Trabia}’s rules, right?{Line} Why don’t we use that, too?”

Monologue.Current: Quistis{Line}“{Char Squall}, you know{Line} {Term Centra}’s rules, right?{Line} Why don’t we use that, too?”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“{Char Squall}, you know{Line} {Term Centra}’s rules, right?{Line} Why don’t we use that, too?”

Monologue.Current: Quistis{Line}“{Char Squall}, you know{Line} {Term Dollet}’s rules, right?{Line} Why don’t we use that, too?”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“{Char Squall}, you know{Line} {Term Dollet}’s rules, right?{Line} Why don’t we use that, too?”

Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“{Char Squall}, you know{Line} Lunar’s rules, right?{Line} Why don’t we use that, too?”
